Class ParticleWave

extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a wave for particles for a given level

      • rand

        public static double rand()
        Randomly generate a double between 0 and 1
        Returns:
        random double

      • maybeCreateNewParticles

        public void maybeCreateNewParticles(int lvlNumber)
        Maybe (may or may not) create new particles at top screen with random velocity and acceleration towards the planet. The higher the level, the higher the probability that a particle will be created.
        Parameters:
        lvlNumber - Level Number

      • maybeSpitSomeParticles

        public void maybeSpitSomeParticles(int lvlNumber)
        Maybe (may or may not) split particles into two particles If split, one particle will head more to the left while the other will head more to the right. Higher the level number, the higher the chance of split.
        Parameters:
        lvlNumber - Level Number

      • integrateAll

        public void integrateAll()
        Update position and velocity of all particles

        Add Particle to Particle Wave
        Parameters:
